about_the_game:
Welcome to an old, ruined train station. A place that will give you a lot of fun!


In Train Station Renovation - Germany DLC you will continue your journey as a renovation company specialised in restoring railway stations. After your succesful run with the full campaign from the base game your company will visit Germany to perform a complex renovation work on new stations. If you liked the original gameplay of Train Station Renovation you will find yourself right at home with this DLC! Clean, fix and decorate the stations away and make sure that each of them is ready for new visitors!



Continuation of your journey!

If you've ever felt the need to continue your adventures as renovator this DLC will scratch that particular itch! Over 6 hours of fun with new stations will bring new possibilities for your work and opportunities for you to showcase your soul of a decorator - now with over 30 new items available for all your furnishing purposes!




New stations!

Germany welcomes you with 9 well-designed and unique stations inspired by the culture and architecture from the country itself. Each of them posses their own remarkable features - be it the overall architectural design, use of colours or the atmosphere surrounding them.




Updated graffiti and new music tracks!

We know you liked the graffiti from the original Train Station Renovation and we're happy to see that you will be able to explore and discover a variety of new artworks scattered across our new stations. Be sure to find them all to the tunes of 10 new songs! They will definitely make your work so much better when playing through the DLC - we've included tracks that are sure to tickle your fancy!
